author: Maine Updates
title: Join Your Neighbors for Very Merry Falmouth: December 4-6 Community Events and Festivities - NewsBreak
text:
5 hours ago The annual Very Merry Falmouth celebration will take place from Thursday, December 4, to Saturday, December 6, 2025. The event offers three days of activities for the community in Falmouth, Maine. Most events are free and open to the public.
The celebration begins on Thursday, December 4, at 5:30 pm with a Community Tree Lighting at Village Park. A guest will help light the town’s holiday tree. This event is organized by Falmouth Parks and Community Programs and is free to attend.
On Friday, December 5, the Merry Mix & Mingle will be held from 6:00 pm to 8:00 pm in the American Legion Parking lot on Depot Road. The event includes music, snacks, children’s activities, and a Touch-A-Truck experience. Fireworks are scheduled for 7:00 pm and can be viewed from the event site or along Route 1.
Saturday, December 6, features the Ugly Sweater 5K and Merry Mile at 9:00 am. Proceeds will benefit the Falmouth Memorial Library. Other activities include free holiday movies at Flagship Cinema, ice skating on Twombly Pond, and holiday fairs at Foreside Community Church and St. Mary’s. Residents are encouraged to support local businesses during the celebration.
